page.title: 08HAINAULT TRAVEL
page.content:
The most popular resort in 1985 is Yugoslavia. 150 people a week go on holiday and 4 people on weekend trips a month by Hainault Travel. 10% of people come back from their holiday and they have complaints. They say that it is easier to confirm flights with a computer. They have a client who goes on holiday every 4 weeks. They have special leaflets for children who go on holiday on their own. It states language the children speak , who they've got to meet etc.
The most popular travel brochure is Thompson. More people go on holiday abroad than they do here. Hainault Travel have been in operation for 10 years.
